channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Jeu vidéo | La sortie du très attendu GTA VI encore repoussée, au 19 novembre 2026
item.description: La sortie de Grand Theft Auto VI (« GTA VI »), nouvel opus de la très célèbre série de jeux vidéo d’action, prévue initialement pour l’automne 2025 puis annoncée pour le printemps, a été repoussée au 19 novembre 2026, a indiqué jeudi l’éditeur Rockstar Games.

item.title: Report: ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ Is Getting a Sequel and the Gang Is All Back
item.description: Gareth Edwards is expected to return along with stars Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Bailey, and Mahershala Ali.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto VI launch delayed until November 2026
item.description: Grand Theft Auto VI is being delayed again: it will now launch on November 19th, 2026. “We are sorry for adding additional time to what we realize has been a long wait, but these extra months will allow us to finish the game with the level of polish you have come to expect and deserve,” […]

item.title: Meta estimates that it earns 10% of its revenue from scams, report says
item.description: These fraudulent ads purport to offer a product or service that isn't actually real, and may be intended to solicit payments from less savvy users.

item.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI has $20B ARR and about $1.4 trillion in data center commitments
item.description: Altman named a long list of upcoming business he thinks will generate significant revenue.

item.title: Amazon offers AI translation for self-published Kindle books
item.description: Amazon is making it easier for self-published authors to release their ebooks in multiple languages with Kindle Translate, a new AI translation tool that launched in beta on Thursday to a limited number of Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP) authors. In its early form, it can translate between English and Spanish and from German to English, […]

item.title: TikTok Billionaire Is Making Bari Weiss’s ‘Anti-Woke’ College Tuition Free
item.description: The University of Austin just received a generous gift from a deep-pocketed benefactor.

item.title: Venomous ‘Murder Hornets’ Kill Two American Tourists on Vacation in Laos
item.description: The victims were stung dozens of times and suffered severe anaphylactic shock.

item.title: He’s drawn Donald Trump hundreds of times. Now he’s drawing Zohran Mamdani
item.description: Illustrator Edel Rodriguez is famous for his acerbic drawings of Trump. Now a cover for ‘The New Yorker’ featuring Mamdani shows his style in a new light. Artist Edel Rodriguez is famous for his satirical images of Donald Trump. Since 2016, he’s produced dozens of images of the President in an ultra-simple, pop-art style. But for Rodriguez’s new cover of The New Yorker commemorating Zohran Mamdani’s victory in the New York City mayoral race, he threw that signature look out the window....

item.title: Google to buy carbon credits from massive Amazonian reforestation project
item.description: The deal is the first selected by the Symbiosis Coalition, an advance market commitment founded to seed the market for nature-based carbon removal.

item.title: Researchers claim ChatGPT has a whole host of worrying security flaws - here's what they found
item.description: Some of the flaws were fixed but not all - leaving the door open for attacks.

item.title: Amazon launches an AI-powered Kindle Translate service for ebook authors
item.description: Kindle Translate, an AI-powered translation service, is designed to broaden the reach of ebook authors.

item.title: The Brane X Portable Bluetooth Speaker Is the Final Boss of Bass
item.description: The Brane X shoves a subwoofer inside, and the results are booming.

item.title: The best budget smartphone you can buy
item.description: Some of us take a kind of “I eat to live” rather than an “I live to eat” approach to gadgets. They’re tools that help you get things done, not something you want to invest a lot of time or money in. If that’s you — and there’s no judgment here from a certifiable gadget […]

item.title: Sam Altman says he doesn’t want the government to bail out OpenAI if it fails
item.description: The furor over Sarah Friar's comments grew so loud that Trump's AI Czar David Sacks weighed in.

item.title: Ford execs reportedly discuss ending the F-150 Lightning
item.description: Production was already paused as Ford prioritizes gas and hybrid versions of the truck. The Lightning has been on the market for three years.

item.title: Trump Gives Out the Wrong URL for His Drug Website During Chaotic Press Conference
item.description: Man down in the Oval Office.

item.title: Watch the Cast of the Unreleased ‘Fantastic Four’ Movie Take Their Place in Marvel History
item.description: The stars of Roger Corman's never-released 1994 film look back on what could've been as part of their cameos in 'Fantastic Four: First Steps.'

item.title: The 65 Best Movies on Disney+ Right Now (November 2025)
item.description: The Fantastic Four: First Steps, Thunderbolts*, and Something Wicked This Way Comes are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: Senators call on Trump to continue banning Nvidia from selling its best chips in China
item.description: A group of senators is urging President Donald Trump to preserve the US’s edge in AI development by denying China access to its most advanced chips and models. The bipartisan resolution, submitted by Sens. Chris Coons (D-DE) and Tom Cotton (R-AR), comes just days after Trump walked back a statement that suggested he would consider […]

item.title: Sora for Android saw nearly half a million installs on its first day
item.description: This makes the Android launch more than 4x the size of the iOS launch, with 327% more installs (360,000) — but the firm notes that's not an apples-to-apples comparison.

item.title: Kuxiu’s magnetic multi-device power bank now has faster 25W wireless charging
item.description: Last August, Kuxiu debuted a MagSafe battery that can do more than just wirelessly charge your phone. The company’s K1 wireless power bank featured a unique design that split and swiveled 90-degrees to reveal a second wireless charger for the Apple Watch or AirPods. Kuxiu’s new K1 Ultra does the exact same thing, but now […]

item.title: The 'world's first' glasses-free 3D PC handheld looks a little ridiculous, especially at $1,799 – and honestly, I'd rather have a Steam Deck
item.description: What are we even doing at this point?

item.title: The best early Black Friday deals we’ve found so far on laptops, TVs, and more
item.description: Black Friday is the most anticipated day of the year for bargain hunters. While there’s still some time to go before November 28th, we’re already starting to see a selection of early discounts, allowing you to get a jump on your holiday shopping. Right now, for instance, you can get nearly 50 percent off select […]

item.title: AI Capabilities May Be Overhyped on Bogus Benchmarks, Study Finds
item.description: They're dumber than you think and they might be cheating.
